Which of the following is a type of connective tissue?
What is the function of adipose tissue?
answer:
Function of Adipose Tissue:
Adipose tissue is a type of loose connective tissue that primarily stores energy in the form of fat (lipids). It also serves to insulate the body against heat loss and provides cushioning for vital organs.
